files.template:
version: '3'
services:
  otel-collector:
    image: otel/opentelemetry-collector:latest
    command: ["--config=/etc/otel-collector-config.yaml"]
    ports: ["4318:4318"]
    volumes:
      - ./otel-collector-config.yaml:/etc/otel-collector-config.yaml:ro

receivers:
  otlp:
    protocols:
      http:
exporters:
  logging: {}
processors:
  batch: {}
extensions: {}
service:
  pipelines:
    traces:
      receivers: [otlp]
      processors: [batch]
      exporters: [logging]

# Collector with docker-compose

- Start: `docker compose -f otel/docker-compose.yml up -d`
- Send traces: set `OTLP_URL=http://localhost:4318/v1/traces` in your app
- Logs appear in collector stdout
